text: Jaime Ortí Ruiz (24 January 1947 - 24 November 2017) was a Spanish football businessman and sports commentator. He was born in Aldaya, Spain. He was one of the Presidents of the football team Valencia C.F.. He was believed to have created the term "Galácticos" to describe the Real Madrid team. He was also a sports commentator for Channel Nou. Ortí died in Valencia, Spain on 24 November 2017 from lung cancer at the age of 70.Muere Jaime Ortí, el presidente más exitoso de la historia del Valencia ==References== ==Other websites== *Jaime Ortí: "En el Valencia se ha tirado el dinero, los presupuestos se deben equilibrar" from Las Provincias (16/03/2009) Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Spanish football managers Category:Spanish businesspeople Category:People from Valencia
title: Jaime Ortí
